courses.title: Introduction to Mycelia: Personal Data Ownership
courses.description: A comprehensive introduction to Mycelia's vision of personal data ownership, covering the core concepts, benefits, and practical applications.

instructor.name: Dr. Elena Rodriguez
instructor.bio: Dr. Rodriguez is a renowned computer scientist and privacy advocate with over 20 years of experience in distributed systems and cryptography.

modules.title: The Problem with Today's Web
modules.content: Understanding the current state of data ownership and privacy on the web, including surveillance capitalism and user exploitation.

modules.title: Mycelia's Solution
modules.content: Exploring how Mycelia addresses data ownership issues through Personal Data Vaults, decentralized identity, and user-centric design.

modules.title: Personal Data Vaults Deep Dive
modules.content: Technical overview of Personal Data Vault architecture, encryption, access controls, and privacy guarantees.

modules.title: BLOOM Token Economics
modules.content: Understanding the BLOOM token system, Proof of Contribution, and the attention economy model.

modules.title: Getting Started with Mycelia
modules.content: Practical steps to start using Mycelia, including account setup, vault configuration, and first interactions.

learningOutcomes: Understand the problems with current web data ownership
Explain Mycelia's approach to personal data sovereignty
Describe Personal Data Vault architecture and benefits
Understand BLOOM token economics and earning mechanisms
Set up and configure a basic Mycelia account

courses.title: Advanced Mycelia Development
courses.description: An advanced technical course for developers who want to build applications on the Mycelia platform, covering APIs, SDKs, and integration patterns.

instructor.name: Alice Chen
instructor.bio: Alice is the lead developer of the Mycelia platform with extensive experience in distributed systems, cryptography, and user-centric design.

modules.title: Mycelia SDK Overview
modules.content: Comprehensive overview of the Mycelia SDK, including installation, configuration, and basic usage patterns.

modules.title: Personal Data Vault Integration
modules.content: Deep dive into integrating with Personal Data Vaults, including data storage, retrieval, and permission management.

modules.title: Oracle Agent Development
modules.content: Building custom Oracle agents for local data processing, including search, analysis, and recommendation systems.

modules.title: BLOOM Token Integration
modules.content: Implementing BLOOM token rewards in applications, including attention tracking, contribution measurement, and payout systems.

modules.title: Social Graph Applications
modules.content: Building social features using Mycelia's Social Graph, including contact management, relationship mapping, and privacy controls.

modules.title: Deployment and Production
modules.content: Best practices for deploying Mycelia applications to production, including security, performance, and monitoring.

learningOutcomes: Install and configure the Mycelia SDK
Integrate applications with Personal Data Vaults
Build social features using the Social Graph
